text: Eurico Ângelo de Oliveira Miranda (7 June 1944 – 12 March 2019) was a Brazilian politician and sports businessman. He was president of Vasco da Gama from 2014 until 17 January 2018. He was president of Vasco da Gama between 2001 and 2008. In politics, he was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1995 to 2002. Miranda died on 12 March 2019 in Rio de Janeiro from brain cancer, aged 74. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Brazil Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro Category:Businesspeople from Rio de Janeiro
title: Eurico Miranda
